channel.title: Doc Test of Stone
channel.description: Recent content on Doc Test of Stone

item.title: Tutorial of Doc-site Deployment with Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Install Hugo on Windows 10 Download the according Hugo zip file for Windows 10 from Hugo Releases. Extract the zip file and you will see one executable and a couple markdown files. Copy hugo.exe to root folder, i.e. C:\Hugo\bin. Open Control Panel, find All Control Panel Items and then System; add your Hugo path (i.e.C:\Hugo\bin) to your Environment Variables as both in User Variables and System Variables; click OK to all buttons.
